description: A point to point walk from Moreton in Marsh to Stow on the Wold using a section of the Monarch's Way long distance trail. The walk is just over 6 miles, taking in the villages of Longborough, Donnington and Broadwell. On the way there's some moderate hill climbs with wonderful views over the Cotswolds countryside from the high points. To continue your walking in the area you can try our Moreton-in-Marsh Circular Walk which visits the lovely Sezincote House and Batsford Arboretum .
